categories: Category:Star Wars: Tales of the Jedi - Redemption

nodes.text: Star Wars: Tales of the Jedi - Redemption
Star Wars: Tales of the Jedi - Redemption, originally titled Tales of the Jedi: The Redemption of Ulic Qel-Droma, is a Star Wars Legends comic book miniseries written by Kevin J. Anderson.
It is the final series spun off from Star Wars: Tales of the Jedi, and it ran from July 22, 1998 to November 25, 1998, following the release of The Fall of the Sith Empire in 1997.
